objects.name: txt
objects.string:
This thing, this... it carries an evil spirit, this knife is from the year 1582 and everyone who have touched it have died. 
May God be with you.

parameters: "Dr. Stein??? The nerd who only cares about money? Yeah I don't like her, glad she left, that dress was so tacky. I heard that she owed the bank a big sum of money because she wrongly identified some stones or rocks or whatever she does. Her firm went bankrupt and she's living in her University cabinet for now. I don't know a single man out there who would be ready to date someone with no sense of fashion."

"Thank you for this quick summary my dear lady, perhaps you would know more about this house's history and maybe there's a slight chance that Dr. Stein would commit homicide in order to reclaim her inheritance?"

"If only she had the courage to kill someone, I mean she dresses weird and is weird but I don't think she's a murderer, after all everything she does results in failure. Anyways, did you hear that the royal family lost their dog to a…"

"We have called the police and they are on their way to arrest you for murdering Johan. We know about your deal with Dr. Stein. We know you like expensive jewelry and she is a stone scientist. Now if you tell me why you did it, we can get you an easier sentence in the court"
"Wewewewell… I didn't. I don't. I what. Is Johan dead? What?"

"Oh god I am so sorry. As soon as Dr. Stein told me she has found a new expensive material for womens jewelry, I listened in. She told that it's quite easy to handle, yet rare. That she has done some geological surveys and calculations for the sum of mining this crystal..."

"Then I told her that I would like to invest further. She gladly accepted, however, my dad was not so keen to share money. I made that stupid nerd make a firm for us. She even chose an unsexy name for it. Anyways, she told me she has the right to inherit this house in case Johan gives up on it or dies..."

"After she crunched some numbers, she found out she can get up to 4 million pounds of loan if she uses this house as collateral. Johan didn't accept our cause so I said this won't work out unless you kill Johan. Would you really think I can kill someone? Blood dries out skin and I have to look good at all times. I didn't hear back from her for several months and I thought I could have a word with her today, but she left so fast. But you have to trust me, I didn't kill Johan…"
"Weird, innit? They make you work at night and yet complain. Oh god I wish they will give me a pay rise at least!"
"Excuse me sir, do you know anything about Dr. Stein?"
"Don't call me sir, I'm just a lonely gardener. I don't know anything about Dr. Stein or any of the guests."
"You have an odd accent, where are you from and could you tell me more about the owner of this building?"

"Here they call me Mark, because Uko is too hard for them to pronounce. I am from Finland. We don't ask many questions. I know Mr. Shaft pays my salary and I get the work done, that's all what matters, but perhaps you could ask his wife Annabelius about him."
"Hello, my dear lady, how are you enjoying the party so far?"

"I hate these kind of parties, yet Johan still organizes them. There is no point for me to come enjoy this, that Marie won't shut up and will blabla for hours about nonsense fashion or drama. I'm more of an intelligent chat enjoyer."
"But why not talk to Dr. Stein instead?"
"I cannot stand a person so narrow minded like Stella, she only cares about her little stones and money. Yes she is educated but she lacks the human aspect."
